title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Very informal and friendly. Asked the regular questions and gave time for me to ask questions too. Felt very comfortable and welcomed the minute I walked in. Everyone was friendly.
Interview Questions: Name a time you worked with a difficult co-worker and how did you overcome it?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Basic interview questions. Most questions started with “Tell me about a time... what did you do in that situation.”  They basically want to get an idea of your thought process and an idea of how you handle difficult situations.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time that you seen someone doing something unsafe.

title: RN Critical Care Float Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Very easy interview. Willing to work with schedule. Plenty of hours available. Would work here again if lived in the area. Pay was competitive for the area. Management average. Provided training.
Interview Questions: How many hours are you available? Would you work in PACU as well?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: I applied to Rex online and a couple of weeks later received a phone call to schedule an interview for the following week. I was interviewed by the team leader, who is a very nice and friendly RN. She was very easy going which made answering her questions very easy. This is my first and only CNA job, after passing my certification tests and deciding not to work as a CNA until months before my certification expired. The interview was not very long, due to there being many other interviews going on in the same room. In the end, I was offered the position a couple days later and accepted.
Interview Questions: Why did you decide to work as a nursing assistant?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Morrisville, NC) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: After a brief (30 minute) phone screen they may invite you to participate in face-to-face panel  interviews. The panel interviews may consist of 1-3 people each and last about 60 minutes.  During the panel interviews, they use the STAR Interview Response Technique.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to complete a task under a tight deadline. Describe the situation, and explain how you handled it.

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Easy to set up and easy to find the hospital. The interview its self went well. Got a tour of the unit as well as enough time to answer all questions. The interview was very helpful in providing enough info to make a decision
Interview Questions: What made you choose nursing

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with hiring manager, then hiring manager in-person interview and then a final interview with the department lead. Took quite a long time from start of process to offer, like 3 months total. Not sure if this is the usual or just because of holidays or other considerations.
Interview Questions: Is there anything that was disappointing about your last job?

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Filled out an online application which included an essay and my school transcript, manager called and contacted me to set up an interview. The interview consisted of almost entirely behavioral interview questions.  After the interview, I was offered a job by HR approx two weeks later
Interview Questions: Tell me one time where you resolved conflict with a coworker

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Good interview, hiring and on-boarding process.  They do a great job of keeping candidates informed of where they are in the interview process.  Staff are thorough and very courteous.
Interview Questions: Use behavioral based interview questions.  Looking for caring, compassionate and customer focused employees.

title: Clinical Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was pretty simple. Not as long as I had expected but very in depth for sure. They asked me questions individually and then also had someone who works in my current job description as a observer. I had a chance to ask questions as well.
Interview Questions: They asked me why I thought that I should have this job

title: Business Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Lengthy process, check website for updated status, when status changes to "manager reviewing" that's a good sign.  The system moves very slow, so be patient.  From application to offer took over 3 months.  They do a very thorough background check ("back to the beginning of time," so be honest from the beginning)
Interview Questions: Why you for this position?

title: Moa Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interview took place in the hospital and was a one on one interview.  It was pretty general asking scenario type questions.  The person who I spoke with was very knowledgeable about the position, benefits, and answered all questions I had.  They were very personable.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time when you went above and beyond for a patient. Be specific.

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very personable with unit manager only. There wasn't an long winded questionnaire nor some personality fit agenda involved. Questions were straight-forward and relevant to the job. The interview was relaxed but straightforward. Management replied with an offer within a reasonable amount of time. Orientation was the longest part of hiring process.
Interview Questions: Do you enjoy what you do? How do view the dynamic between nursing assistants and nurses?

title: IT Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC)
Interview Descriptions: usually 2 interviews
Interview Questions: what is your weakness

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: same questions as usual about past experience, called came in for interview spoke with 2 people took a drug test, left went home, got a call next day with an offer.
Interview Questions: what was a time when you had a conflict

title: Allied Health Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare
Interview Descriptions:
Web application
Called for interview
Interviewed with team
If offered job, will get offer from HR by phone
Based on experience, salary negotiation is not likely (see below)
Interview Questions: None difficult, but disappointed with interview process.

title: Pt Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interview was easy peasy. No hard questions, just questions like- what did you do at your last job and what can you bring to our dept? Tell me abt a time you went above and beyond for a pt? What skillset do you bring? Are you comfortable with asking pts for money?
Interview Questions: None of the questions were extremely difficult.

title: EVS Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rex Healthcare in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Easy interview, very basic questions. The all team seems boring
Interview Questions: What would you do if you see a co-worker doing unethical thing?

title: Communications Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: The interview process consisted of two in person interviews and an offer came very quickly.  Everyone was polite and respectful, and I appreciated how open and honest they were throughout the process.
Interview Questions: What is your work style?

title: Billing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Research Triangle Park, NC) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions:
Received a call to sit down for a formal interview.  I met with three managers from different departments at one time.  I think the interview took about 30 minutes.  They introduced me to a lot of people in several departments.  
About 3 weeks later received a call from HR stating the position is mine if I like.  When I accepted the first things before starting were to go to a Rex orientation and make sure all vaccines required are up to date (which they provide to you free of charge).
Interview Questions:
Do not recall many.  
Q- Where do you see yourself in five years

title: Interviewed to BE the Intern of the Corporate Finance Team Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: First I got a connect through a friend in the company.  I meet the team leader in person before the interview process.  I then had a phone interview that went well.  Typical questions were asked about behavior and stuff like that.  Then I went in for a one on one interview and a week later I went in for a group interview.  For the group interview they gave me a couple of scenarios before hand so i was prepared.
Interview Questions: Asked about resume

title: Web Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rex Healthcare (Raleigh, NC) in Mar 2010
Interview Descriptions: 1st  interview was  phone, then 1:1 with hiring mgr. Then "panel." -people from various part of the dept. -- each with their own view of position. So the job duties were different than previously told. Although I did not get the offer, the HM send a nice hand-written note.
Interview Questions: unexpected was what would I bring to a potluck?
